data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Granada.
In the minute 1, Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Betis.
In the minute 6, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a throw-in for Granada, close to Betis's area.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Sanabria (Betis) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 9, At Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes, Yangel Herrera has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Granada have been given a penalty...
Guido Rodriguez (Betis) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 14, Roberto Soldado nets and Granada now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Roberto Soldado for Granada has been booked by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Betis at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Goal! Granada extend their lead to 2-0 through Roberto Soldado.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Betis.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Betis.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 23, William Carvalho's header is off-target for Betis.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Granada.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Granada throw-in in Betis's half.
In the minute 24, Luis Suarez of Granada gets in a strike, but is off target.
Betis have a goal kick.
Betis's Nabil Fekir gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Granada defender.
In the minute 25, Betis have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Betis's Antonio Sanabria misses with an attempt on goal.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Granada.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Granada are caught offside.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 30, Maxime Gonalons (Granada) has received a yellow card from Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Granada.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Betis at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Betis in the half of Granada.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 39, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Betis in the half of Granada.
In the minute 41, Free kick Betis.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Granada.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Betis.
Corner awarded to Granada.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Granada.
In the minute 45, Betis to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Granada have a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Cristian Tello is replacing Aitor Ruibal for the away team.
Betis make their second substitution with Juanmi replacing Guido Rodriguez.
In the minute 47, Granada are coming forward and Luis Suarez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Betis a goal kick.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Betis.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Betis.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Betis.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Betis throw-in in Granada's half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Betis.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Granada in the half of Betis.
Throw-in for Betis at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Betis are whistled for offside.
In the minute 52, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
In the minute 53, Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Betis have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Granada.
Granada advance rapidly upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows for offside.
Betis's Cristian Tello is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Betis have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows against Betis's Nabil Fekir for offside.
The home team replace Roberto Soldado with Antonio Puertas.
In the minute 58, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Granada.
Granada drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Betis to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Granada to check on Darwin Machis, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 61, Darwin Machis (Granada) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Robert Kenedy.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nabil Fekir (Betis) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 62, Free kick Betis.
Cristian Tello (Betis) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Loren Moron is on a sub for Rodri for Betis.
In the minute 64, Borja Iglesias is replacing Antonio Sanabria for Betis at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Betis are pushing forward but Nabil Fekir's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Granada pushes forward through Robert Kenedy, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Emerson is booked for the away team.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Throw-in for Betis at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Granada push upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 69, Betis to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Granada needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 72, Granada are coming forward and Yangel Herrera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Betis a goal kick.
Betis drive upfield and Nabil Fekir gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Betis.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
In the minute 77, Juanmi is back on his feet again.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Juanmi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Betis in the half of Granada.
In the minute 78, Diego Martinez is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes with Jorge Molina replacing Luis Suarez.
Diego Martinez (Granada) is making a fourth substitution, with Yan Eteki replacing Luis Milla.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Free kick Betis.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Granada throw-in in Betis's half.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Betis.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Betis.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Betis.
In the minute 85, Dimitri Foulquier for Granada is whistled offside.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
In the minute 87, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nabil Fekir (Betis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Betis's Borja Iglesias misses with an attempt on goal.
Granada have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Antonio Puertas of Granada is pulled up for offside.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Betis's William Carvalho has been booked in Granada.
William Carvalho is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
William Carvalho, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Aissa Mandi is the substitute for Betis.
